scripts.gcp-build: cp -r /tmp/lib/packages /workspace && npm install && npm run build && npm pack ../packages/messages && npm install gradientedge-worldpay-raft-messages* && npm pack ../packages/connector && npm install gradientedge-worldpay-raft-connector* && npm pack ../transformers && npm install gradientedge-worldpay-raft-transformers* && rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.prebuild: npm --prefix ../packages/messages install && npm --prefix ../packages/messages run build && npm --prefix ../packages/transformers install && npm --prefix ../packages/transformers run build && npm --prefix ../packages/connector install && npm --prefix ../packages/connector run build && cd .. && husky install
scripts.lint: npm run prebuild && npm --prefix ../packages/messages run lint && npm --prefix ../packages/transformers run lint && npm --prefix ../packages/connector run lint && eslint . --ext .ts
scripts.prettier: npm run prebuild && npm --prefix ../packages/messages run prettier && npm --prefix ../packages/transformers run prettier && npm --prefix ../packages/connector run prettier && prettier --cache --check "**/*.{ts,js,json}"
scripts.prettify: npm run prebuild && npm --prefix ../packages/messages run prettify &&  npm --prefix ../packages/transformers run prettify &&  npm --prefix ../packages/connector run prettify && prettier --cache --write "**/*.{ts,js,json}"
scripts.test:coverage: npm run prebuild && npm --prefix ../packages/messages run test:coverage && npm --prefix ../packages/transformers run test:coverage && npm --prefix ../packages/connector run test:coverage && jest --config jest.config.cjs --coverage --collectCoverageFrom='src/**/*.{ts,jxs}'
scripts.validate: npm run prettier && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
